stories.text:
We are on a mission to secure medical devices and protect those who use them.
The Guardian engineering team at MedCrypt is seeking a Java Software Engineer with extensive experience designing and developing Java server applications, driven by relational databases. Our stack includes Quarkus, Postgres, and AWS.
Employee friendly startup with great benefits. Salary range $130,000 - $140,000.
Apply here: https://angel.co/company/medcrypt/jobs/1541329-medcrypt-ycw19-java-software-engineer-ft-remote
stories.title: MedCrypt (YC W19) Is Hiring: Java Engineer – FT – Remote

stories.text:
Hi Everyone,

I am working on the prototype, and I'd love to hear your feedback on the design, functionality, and overall idea.

Web: https://www.figma.com/proto/9zDVTURe1ZAvEZUZSjdtsu/Timelyst-Demo-1?node-id=429%3A29&scaling=contain&page-id=260%3A198&starting-point-node-id=429%3A29&show-proto-sidebar=1

Mobile: https://www.figma.com/proto/9zDVTURe1ZAvEZUZSjdtsu/Timelyst-Demo-1?node-id=421%3A228&scaling=scale-down&page-id=256%3A153&starting-point-node-id=421%3A228&show-proto-sidebar=1

I'd be happy to hear any feedback. Thank you so much for your attention and participation.

Maria
